translations.translation: Some of them will come up to others and they will question one another.
They will ask each other questions,
They will turn to one another and ask (regarding the past events).
They will turn to one another ask questions,
And one of them turned towards the other, questioning.
And some of them draw near to others, questioning.
And some of them shall advance towards others questioning each other.
They advance one upon another, asking each other questions.
And some of them draw near unto others, questioning,
They will converse with one another, putting questions to each other,
And they will advance Unto each other asking questions.
They will turn to one another, questioning each other.
They will advance to each other, engaging in mutual enquiry.
And some of them draw near to others, questioning.
They will go to one another asking each other questions:
And they will approach one another, inquiring.
And they will approach one another, inquiring of each other.

[52:25] And some among them will turn to one another, questioning each other — they ask one another about how they were in the past and what they have now attained, in their delight and acknowledgement of the grace [of God to them].
(And some of them draw near unto others) upon visiting, (questioning) talking about the life of the world,

commentaries.author: الجيلاني
commentaries.text: { وَأَقْبَلَ بَعْضُهُمْ عَلَىٰ بَعْضٍ } بطريق المسرة والانبساط { يَتَسَآءَلُونَ } [الطور: 25] عن أعمالهم وأحوالهم ومواجيدهم ومقاماتهم
